NETLIFY DEPLOYMENT - READY TO UPLOAD
=====================================

This folder contains your complete portfolio website.

QUICK START:
1. Go to https://app.netlify.com/
2. Drag this entire "dist" folder onto Netlify
3. Your site goes live instantly!

FILES INCLUDED:
- index.html (main page)
- portfolio.css (all styles)
- portfolio.js (animations)
- assets/ (images and resources)
- _redirects (routing config)

âœ“ Responsive design
âœ“ No build required
